website_summaries.verdict: A solid, well-constructed set of shot glasses with an appealing and versatile design.
pros: Users comment on the high quality and appreciate the clean, elegant design of this set
Customers also note the sturdiness of the base and solid feel of the glasses
We love that the look is classy and appeals to any style preference

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, high quality glasses. Amazing Seller!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to make a custom 21st birthday gift. They were perfect! Very different from your normal shot glasses. Heavy weight, unique design. This look classy and will be a perfect addition to your bar or for your event. They look very high end. I did have a problem with a glass being chipped (They are glass, it happens) and the seller immediately contacted me to rectify the situation! I could not be more pleased with the seller and the product! I will purchase more as I have requests/orders for more custom orders! Thank you
customer_reviews.author: JSMSS

customer_reviews.title: No Problems, Just A Well Made and Well Designed Glass Shot Glass!
customer_reviews.text: I did notice the few others who reported receiving damaged items, which i surely do notunderstand as the well made and sturdy shot glasses (with sturdy thickness and no flaws or chips or issues) got here intact, as they were nicely packaged in a well-designed container that kept them secure and isolated during shipment. Perhaps there had been some sort of "quality control issue" but if so this is no longer the case, so my position is to encourage you to buy this item if this is what you are looking for, as I am a most happy curstomer!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Clive F. Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Love these shot glasses!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shot glasses. I've had the regular round shaped ones before but I really like the shape of these. They look a little more fancy. Plus for this price this was a good deal. Worth every penny. 6 came in the pack so now I have enough shot glasses when my crew comes over lol because for the longest I only had 3 shot glasses in my house.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Great shot glasses for the price. Exactly as discribed. Nice, thick glass. Perfect shape for customizing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Levenson

customer_reviews.title: Within 15 months of purchase, three of the six glasses are broken
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size and shape of the glasses very much. Nice, heavy, pretty, unusual glasses. When the set of six arrived, one of the six was broken, cracked between the heavy base and one side of the glass. I figured that I did not really need six glasses, so that was OK. We do not use shot glasses very often, not even once per month. This past week, we were using the remaining five glasses, and discovered two of them were broken in the same manner as the first one. I am quite disappointed and am in the market for more durable shots now.
customer_reviews.author: Kit

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for what I needed them for
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for what I needed them for! I am customizing these to give as a 21st birthday gift and wanted them to be on the heavier side and sturdy, but still look nice. On top of that, the seller reached out to ensure that I received the products okay and to let them know if anything needed to be fixed, which is the main reason I am writing this review. Friendly and attentive customer service along with a quality product will always get 5 stars in my book!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ryden

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I love these shot glasses. They are exactly what I was looking for. Looking at them online, I wasn't that excited but once I got them, it all changed. The design is much nicer in hand then in the mages. There is also a subtle design in them as well that gives them a little extra character. I would definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Radfo

customer_reviews.title: They will work elegently for any occasion.
customer_reviews.text: These will workout perfectly for my Christmas special. Each glass is 2 ounces. I will mix twelve drinks (I have two sets of six) each with a different drink and label them unseen with a yellow sticky note. Then each will have a number 1-12. Then out of a hat everyone will draw a number and they take their corresponding numbered drink. All but two will be mixed drinks, with 7UP, tonic water, grenadine, coke, gingerale and such. They will discover their ingredients, AFTER they take the shot. The shot glasses will work splendidly and besides you can't beat the price for their sturdiness and weight!
customer_reviews.author: G Man

customer_reviews.title: Many uses...
customer_reviews.text: I have a set of colored Chime candle holders. The Chime holders are small but colorful. I was concerned about their stability, so I got this set of shot glasses because the Chime holders are square, and these shot glasses are clear, and square. The shape of the Chimes fit inside these shot glasses perfectly, and the clear shot glass allows the color of each Chime holder to come through for enjoyment, and the melting wax is captured by the shot glass so you don't get wax all over everything. You can also use these shot glasses as small planters for air plants or small bouquets of flowers to put at individual table place settings.
customer_reviews.author: Evening Iris

customer_reviews.title: Stylish Shot Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice little shot glasses. They are about 1x1 inch square. They have a hefty weight so they stay put while pouring. They came quickly and well-packed from Essential Products USA thru the Amazon Marketplace. The only thing you may want to keep in mind is since they are square with straight sides so they are not stack-able like some shot glasses that are flared at the top. This doesn't bother me - since they are square they line up nicely together.
customer_reviews.author: E. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Solid Product
customer_reviews.text: I really only needed one shotglass, but the price was kind of outrageous since for just a bit more I could get these SIX! Now I have more than enough and always have clean ones on hand. They look great and don't have any branding on them at all which I love, the sturdiness is apparent and they make each shot look and feel huge. Every liquor looks good poured in one of these.
customer_reviews.author: Xly

customer_reviews.title: SIZE IS MISSLEADING!!
customer_reviews.text: I thought that these would have been a little taller. In reality to get 2 oz in them you have to pour to the top of the glass. So unless you plan on spilling your drink plan on short pours. I won't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: Love the shape of these shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are what you would expect to see in a high end restaurant/bar. They are very classy looking and have great weight balance. The heavy base provides better stability compared to the normal round shaped shot glasses. I highly recommend this product and your friends will know you put some thought into this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Trying_Healthy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are little perfect shot glasses, I plan on engraving them for a bachelorette party and they are the perfect size! The only thing that was a downside. They weren't very secure in the box, there was only one air cushion in the box, so when I picked up the box it was moving around and sliding. I was nervous to open the box, but I was lucky enough to not have any broken.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Seem nice, but got A box of rejects...
customer_reviews.text: I had to contact customer service about these. They seem like a very nice glass, however I received 4 out of 6 with issues and they have bits of loose glass in hem as well that may break free when using them, I don’t think they’re safe. :( Maybe I just received a box of the returned ones?
customer_reviews.author: LizAnn

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for juice shots, not alcohol. They're definitely heavy and good quality; however, I didn't need 6 and they're a little heavier than I would prefer. Not sure that I would order again. If I had kept the box, I would have likely returned them. If you're looking for dessert shots for a party or even alcohol, you'll likely be happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality!
customer_reviews.text: Though we do not drink alcohol, we do like our liquid custard and our eggnog. But before we found these shot glasses, we would use our regular drinking glasses for our sweet drinks but considering that we only drank 1 or 2 oz. at a time, we thought shot glasses would be more practical, and they are! Theses shot glasses are sturdy and classy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional but poor quality
customer_reviews.text: They look fine but they really are poor quality. The glass feels rough/unfinished in places. They work for Saturday guys night but I wouldn't use them for anything nice, and I certainly wouldn't give them as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: S. Furst

customer_reviews.title: Really very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice shot glasses. They have some heft to them and they feel really nice in your hands. I put them in the dishwasher and so far they hold up without a problem. There are some glasses that after a few times in the dishwasher just crack but these seem to be holding up nicely. I would def recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Ken R.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are everything I need/wanted! They are heavy, thick, perfect to work with and beautiful. I order 2 boxes and both boxes were perfect no damages. Great value for the price and will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Crys

customer_reviews.title: Love these Shot Glasses
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 2 oz shot glasses to use for my essential oils. The plastic ones I had to take my NingXia Red with Red EO was degrading due to the the EO. So these are perfect. I put our initials on them so I know which one is for my husband and which on is mine. I have a set upstairs and one downstairs to make it easy.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: i used these to make shot glasses as a wedding favor. They were very easy to etch since they have flat sides making it easy to apply a stencil to put etching cream on. They also etched very well. I will be buying again for more etching projects
customer_reviews.author: carol monteith

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for "neat" whiskey pours
customer_reviews.text: The perfect size unless you actually like pouring a single shot into an 8-12 ounce glass. The small glass allows me to pour what I want without having to measure it as well as makes it easy to take small sips so I can savor every drop. They're a nice solid glass, too, that survive being put on a top rack prong in my dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Great size and they feel very durable and solid... And hold what appears to be a little bit more than normal shot glass... They’re very basic and yet they look classic and will fit in with any Decor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t really hold 2 ounces
customer_reviews.text: The shot glasses are pretty but they are not really a 2 ounce size unless you fill them to the brim. The one on the left is a one ounce and the set I purchased are advertised to hold 2 ounces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: This is a great and heavy set of shot glasses. Any seasoned shot drinker will appreciate this set. This would definitely make a great gift as well. Looks pretty on display too.
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and always accurate, 2-oz.
customer_reviews.text: Glasses with the heavy base are perfect for the Chocolate and Wine Fund Raiser, no fear of them tipping over. I tried 12 Posi-Pour 2-oz pourers for the purpose of having both white and red wine tasting for 200 patrons, but they were not consistent. I need consistency so that patrons would see that the 2-oz pour was the same for everyone. They would have been a faster serve, but the 12 posi-pourers that I used were not accurate. The heavy base shot glasses are accurate, but only if the server does not overflow the glass. I need consistency so that the patrons are HAPPY. It was truly disappointing the the posi-pourers did not work for the three stations. Billie
customer_reviews.author: Billie Young

customer_reviews.title: OK and simple
customer_reviews.text: First set arrived broken but that was Amazon shipping issue having put this into a box with a case of soda workout padding that crushed the glasses. Replacement ordered and arrived fine. The base is heavy and nice to hold a chill. The glasses is a bit thin but very usable. Good value. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: TM_067

customer_reviews.title: I'm assuming it was just a bad casting since most reviews on this product are very ...
customer_reviews.text: All six shot glasses formed a hairline crack after washing. Three of them then completely broke after pouring chilled liquid into them. I'm assuming it was just a bad casting since most reviews on this product are very positive. However these six shot glasses have been 100% dissatisfactory for me.
customer_reviews.author: James Corscaden

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t like them
customer_reviews.text: They’re way too small for being 2 Oz shot glasses. Really tough to hold. Basically like a mini-glass. Really wish they’d have made them more taller and skinnier.
customer_reviews.author: 6ixReviews

customer_reviews.title: Just what hubby wanted
customer_reviews.text: These came well packed which is good because they got thrown over the fence by the delivery person. Did not break. They have a nice shape, kind of square shaped, with a heavy bottom as advertised. These met my husbands expectations unlike the other ones I had ordered first. Would order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I actually purchased these as ashtrays, thus not for what they were....
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased these as ashtrays, thus not for what they were intended for. They are perfect for the occasional smoke that I might take. Thus they are elegant, when not in use, but when I need them, there they are. And so many for such a small price. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: LifesavrTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Great gift!! I created a housewarming gift for my sister with everything she’d need for her new bar and the shot glasses were the perfect addition!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: Looked like the On Trac delivery person threw the box over the fence, even though the security gate was unlocked. The set is a gift so I opened it to check the glasses. They were snug in the box with no chips or cracks. The shot glasses are so cute and sturdy and packaged very well. Might get a set for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Kololia

customer_reviews.title: The look and the feelnof the glass ..
customer_reviews.text: The product likes and feels good in hand. But there's one of the glass which has a sharpe broken chard on one side of.. Beyound this there are great glasses. Thanks Hollywood✌
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Good to drink from but unfortunately came broken 2 of them
customer_reviews.text: Came broken and i got offered either to replace or return me half refund and i made my choise but no one returned me anything ...
customer_reviews.author: Kanan Musayev

customer_reviews.title: CHIPPED AND BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: They are not packaged well as two were broken in half. Another a chipped edge. The one good quality is they are easy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: GREAT shot glasses!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice set of high-quality shot glasses. They were received in excellent condition due to the careful attention to packaging detail. These would make a good gift! This seller clearly takes pride in its brand.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie Bovender

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: These things are sturdy! I've dropped a few times and they don't break. The sleek design is also very appealing . Yes I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yackie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glasses!
customer_reviews.text: beautiful, very heavy glasses. even though two were broken probably in shipment the price was so fair I decided to simply keep the four instead of sending them back. they are that good.
customer_reviews.author: Aschendorff

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift, so haven't used, but I did inspect them upon arrival. They are heavier than I'd anticipated, and I'm very pleased. I'm sure they will be well received.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T

customer_reviews.title: Heavy base shot glasses, packed securely
customer_reviews.text: Items packed well for shipping, arrived undamaged and is indeed bottom heavy, feels nice and sturdy to hold.
customer_reviews.author: SHERMAINE

customer_reviews.title: great glasses at a great price
customer_reviews.text: they arrived packaged well and the shipment arrived faster than expected. Love these shot glasses
customer_reviews.author: tina

customer_reviews.title: Your basic heavy shot glass. Easy to use and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this glassware for my bar. The 2 ounce shot glasses are sturdy and make it easy to pour a full shot of whiskey without any overpour or mess. I like the shot glass size as a different way to serve my less expensive whiskeys instead of the larger whiskey glasses which I reserve for my special whiskeys.
customer_reviews.author: dogwood

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, bottom heavy shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: This was a great value for the money. These glasses are very durable and I loved the weighted bottoms. Would definitely buy again if I ever need more.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: Joyjolt reached out to me and sent 12 shot glasses! Now I have tons with spares to boot. I changed this to a 5 star from a 1 solely based on customer service. A very nice note was added as well. Original Message: Cool shot glasses. Just wish I could have used them all. Two were broken :(. The packaging could have been tighter and the glasses could have used better prtection as well. Nothing to keep them from banging together but thin cardboard. I’ll settle for four.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift Item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a secret Santa gift at work and I was impressed with the quality and durability of the product. Shipping was right on just as it says for Prime members.
customer_reviews.author: K. Wiegman

customer_reviews.title: The right item for the right price.
customer_reviews.text: The shot glasses arrived in excellent condition and they were exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Ephraim Elizondo

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for shot glasses that were a little upscale and sophisticated. I love the shape of these, plus they are sturdy and thick. My Clase Azul tequila looked and tasted great in these!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed with the heft and feel of these. Well crafted, excellent addition to my bar.
customer_reviews.author: Avonlakebud

customer_reviews.title: Solid n perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: Solid. Feels great in hand. Use them daily for daily juice dosages and sometimes liquor. Love them !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy for shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great shot glasses that are 2 ounces. I love the square round shape and the heavy feel.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: Good-looking & sturdy set of shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These have good weight to them and the square design adds something to the aesthetic.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Affordable Shot Glasses
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses were purchased as an adult party favor for men. The style of the glasses have a square shape and decent in size for vinyl if interested. I decorated them with a blocky style initial for the men I purchased these for. They were really pleased and enjoyed them.
customer_reviews.author: KaToya Grant

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a house warming present for my boyfriend and he loves them! Very sturdy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great for Tequila Shots!
customer_reviews.text: Strong base allows you to slam the shot glass onto the bar without breaking the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Frisky

customer_reviews.title: Super solid!
customer_reviews.text: I used these for glass etching crème and they turned out perfect. I've given several as gifts and everyone has loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Maxey

customer_reviews.title: Great shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are the 3rd joyjolt item that I have purchased on Amazon (I also got the stemless wine glasses and martini glasses). I love all of them! They are all made of very sturdy glass as well as having a unique, cool look to them! I love the squarish shape of the shot glasses. All of these products arrived on time and intact! I highly recommend all of the above mentioned JoyJolt products!
customer_reviews.author: naomi harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. They seem to be pretty sturdy and I like the more modern look.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Torrence

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: The classes were in good condition, they were not broken and the size was a shoot a good buy no hassle or issues. A set good for if you have a few friends over and take straight shots before the bars set like 6 most of us only got that many good friends if that
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Giftable!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my buddy. He loves them. Makes a great gift for friends that enjoy shots. They feel hefty and have a good clean finish.
customer_reviews.author: Damian

customer_reviews.title: Bottoms up
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a very good heavy base shot glass look no further.👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: Broken glasses
customer_reviews.text: One of the glasses arrived broken sending it back. I’m super disappointed because they looked perfect for what I was going to do. I’m going to try and purchase once more.
customer_reviews.author: Deedy Butler

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set
customer_reviews.text: Nice set, just what we were looking for and at a great price. A little bit smaller than I thought but actually just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glass but kinda easy to broke.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful small shot glasses! Only reason I give a four star is that it is not as strong as it should be. Two of them just broken while I rinsing them. Not sure what was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Yan G.

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delighted with this shot glasses. They are heavy and feel great in your hand. Love the shape and clarity.
customer_reviews.author: K. Queen

customer_reviews.title: Classy and Durable Glasses. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase! I love the shape and weight of the glasses. Very unique and great quality. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa1028

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice shot glasses. I wish that they were a little more tapered so you could stack them together, but they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Dreaming_Book_Witch

customer_reviews.title: Holds 30 ml
customer_reviews.text: Not 2 oz like the description says, as far as I can tell. Holds 30 ml of liquid up to about 1/8 inch of the top. They are a nice shape though and the quality is quite evident compared to another set of shot glasses that I have.
customer_reviews.author: John Pfersich

customer_reviews.title: These were exactly as described and seem to be great quality. We are having them engraved
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly as described and seem to be great quality. We are having them engraved, so hoping the thick glass holds up during the process.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very quality
customer_reviews.text: I love these shot glasses. Very quality and a great gift
customer_reviews.author: Nikkie N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Shot Glasses.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality shot glasses. Thick and sturdy. Look good as well.
customer_reviews.author: N. Loy

customer_reviews.title: Great shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: Great shot glasses. Squared at top but doesn’t affect drinking from them and allows them to stack nicely. Good weight. Plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great Weight
customer_reviews.text: A very solid shot glass. It has a good feel to them and does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: Great shot glasses you’ll love!
customer_reviews.text: I love the glasses! Very solid & sturdy, nice-looking too!! The packaging was especially good, packed efficiently and very securely. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Gj

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for a party and love them! I needed a double shot glass for "Mini Beers" and these work great! I also really like the square design as I was hoping for a double shot glass that was not a basic boring round glass. Will shop with this vendor again as they have lots of interesting glassware.
customer_reviews.author: Jane E Adams

customer_reviews.title: Super Awesome Fun Sauce
customer_reviews.text: These 2 oz. shot glasses are wonderful! As soon as they arrived I filled them with Fireball Whiskey and went to town. They fully met all my expectations for standard heavy based shot glasses and filled my tummy with alcoholic yummy-ness! I was overjoyed after my 10th shot that these babies were still performing like new. I recommend these to everyone and anyone who loves to down liquor at a rampant pace and get saucy like a boss!
customer_reviews.author: TK421DS

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good packaging. Easy to hold. Look and feel good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Vish B

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and heavy.
customer_reviews.text: These shot glasses are solid, heavy and display a simple elegance. I am thoroughly pleased.
customer_reviews.author: John Hewitt

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking!
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking and seem sturdy. I like the thick base and modern square shape. They arrived unbroken in a stray box.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great bar glasses
customer_reviews.text: Rapid delivery. Glasses feel very solid and are dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great shot glasses, heavy, plain, attractive. Hard to find, too many "designer" sets out there. If you have a Keurig, they make a great holder for the basket inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Rick

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as shown
customer_reviews.text: The glasses look just like how they were shown online. They’re very sturdy and have no problems with washing them in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Saawan Mehta

customer_reviews.title: My go to shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty sweet looking shot glasses! Great product, and outstanding customer service!! I will definitely buy again. 😘😍💖
customer_reviews.author: Divergent

customer_reviews.title: Solid looking glasses
customer_reviews.text: While I haven't had a chance to use them yet as I am currently awaiting on a drink to arrive, I am so far impressed by the design and feel of the glasses. They came to me in excellent condition (no chips, no broken glasses) and they look really solid. It is my first shot glass so not too sure what to be looking out for but once my liquor arrives, I'll be able to give them a solid try and update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Quirindongo

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Shot Glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and a good price. Love the follow up correspondence. Nice shot glasses that match my current glassware perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Albe Colón

customer_reviews.title: Almost too nice to use
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses that also work for holding toppings for soups and salads (e.g. chives, chopped bacon, etc).
customer_reviews.author: fiercepapillon

customer_reviews.title: very heavy duty, well worth the $
customer_reviews.text: these shot glasses work perfectly. and bought at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: hockey#19

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy! While I don’t suggest testing this I dropped mine while decorating them and nothing happened! I really like the square shape to these glasses! No to mention they work well for decorations.
customer_reviews.author: Ama Asante

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: Great little shot glasses. Classy looking. I bought them for a port tasting and they look expensive. So great deal over all
customer_reviews.author: Nancy E. Cech

customer_reviews.title: Great for hosting parties
customer_reviews.text: They are cute classy and is just what you need.
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: No leaks
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavy duty no leaks not even one of them
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Heavy weight and attractive.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second box of these glasses I have purchased. The square shape makes them store easily in the freezer or cupboard. And, the heavy bottom is attractive and makes them very stable. Good product and super face delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: These are some great quality shot glasses for the price. They have a nice heavy bottom and they glass is thick. I would buy again if I needed to.
customer_reviews.author: Bjames9665

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCT!!! These shot glasses were perfect. They came well packaged and on time. They are nice and solid glasses with good weight. I would recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: droc42

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that they don't stack but aside from that they are good sturdy shot glasses that i would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: RobTattoo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, heavy shot glasses
customer_reviews.text: I just got them today, and they are exactly what I was expecting. Thick glass, and heavy weight. I was a little disappointed that they are not stackable, but that's not a deal breaker with this kind of quality.
customer_reviews.author: M.Hillard

customer_reviews.title: they are really really good quality for their price
customer_reviews.text: I use them for wheat grass shots instead of bourbon. I've changed. they are really really good quality for their price. Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lange

customer_reviews.title: Good Partyware!
customer_reviews.text: They are the perfect size for my need. The glass is not perfect - no bubbles, but slight flaws and as you wash them I felt a small sharp barb inside 2 of the 6 but for the price they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: more is better
customer_reviews.text: 2 oz. size just right- will get plenty of use- ole!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brice  Beach
